Title: Chris Welty
Body: Electronic Information Director of IJCAI Information Director of ACM SIGART Announcements Editor of the SIGART Bulletin Moderator of the NL-KR Digest Ph.D. from the RPI Computer Science Department Fall 1996 Courses: CMPU-265: Artificial Intelligence Mon & Wed 10:00-11:15, OLB 105 COGS-100: Introduction to Cognitive Science Tues & Thurs 11:30-12:45, Blodgett 105 Research Interests: Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering Specifically, making software more understandable through better representations.
